text: Hello how are you doing?
hi, I am well, how are you?
Im doing good myself thanks for asking. Have you heard of a foundation called "Save The Children"?
I have heard of that before

Did you know millions of Syrian children have grown up facing the daily threat of violence. In the first two months of 2018 alone, 1,000 children were reportedly killed or injured in intensifying violence.
I didn't know the statistics, that is very unfortunate to hear
It really is. Do you donate to the charity now? If so how much a month?
I donate pretty regularly with my kids in school, they have different charities they help out each month.
Would you be interested in donating some of your payment today toward Save the Children?
I suppose I could donate some of my payment today. I will donate 10% of my earnings.
That would be great! I believe everybody has a moral responsibility to help others in need.
I do believe you're right. unfortunately there's a lot more need than I can fix with my $2!
Even the smallest of donations can help a lot of children and their families.
yes, I agree, that's why I try to do a small amount for each charity I am presented with. each one does something so unique.
Thats great to hear, empathy and sympathy goes a long way and is lacking in society so its great to hear another parent trying to help out as much as they can.
thank you, likewise! are there any other charities you like to donate to regularly?

I do have a local charity for homeless citizens, we can donate and put people up in a hotel for a discounted rate, to get them out of the heat/cold and get them a nice meal. Its not much but everybody deserves a helping hand when they are down and out.
a warm night and meal sound good to me, even if its once in awhile. thats a great organization.
I agree in full! Well I totally appreciate your willingness to donate 10% of your task payment today. I will be matching your donation.
that is wonderful to hear! thanks for telling me about the charity. I am happy to help.
Thank you again! Have a great day!
